title: Logo randomly found
content:
I fell in love with this font, especially the P and the s at the end. I have had no luck finding what it was. please help! Thanks!

Font: 

 Slogan 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124926/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [pluriels.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124926/http:/typophile.com/files/pluriels.jpg) | 37.89 KB |
author: rapunzel

comments.content: It must be **[Slogan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124926/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=SloganJoiD%20-%20Regular&fid=33a435452bfce6f7dfea38c8a684c546&fsize=60&text=Pluriels&fit=1)** (aka Slogan Joi D ) by Helmut Matheis available from URW++, Linotype, E&F but I'm afraid the /s is modified in your sample
